ns0:StringWithMarkup.ns0:String: LC50 Salmo gairdneri (Rainbow trout, mean length 44mm, mean weight 0.61 g, age 3 months) >1000 mg/L/24 hr; 947.6 mg/L/48 hr (95% confidence interval: 785-1144 mg/L); 422.7 mg/L/96 hr; static, pH 7.54, 10 °C +/- 1 °C, total alkalinity 28 mg/L and CaCO3, total hardness 42 mg/L as CaCO3, specific conductivity 145 umhos/cm /93.81% pure chlorendic anhydride/

LC50 Lepomis macrochirus (Bluegill sunfish, mean length 27 mm, mean weight 0.19 g, age 3 months) >560 mg/L/24 hr; 710.3 mg/L/48 hr (95% confidence interval: 632.9-797.1 mg/L); 422.7 mg/L/96 hr; static, 22.0 °C +/- 1 °C, pH 7.4, total hardness 42 mg/L as CaCO3, total alkalinity 28 mg/L as CaCO3, specific conductivity 145 umhos/cm /93.81% pure chlorendic anhydride/

LC50 Daphnia magna (age <20 hr) 127.9 mg/L/24 hr (95% confidence interval: 118.1-138.4 mg/L); 110.7 mg/L/48 hr (95% confidence interval: 97.6-125.6 mg/L); static- nonrenewal, 17 +/- 2 °C, pH 4.50-7.43, hardness 52 mg/L as CaCO3, alkalinity 29 mg/L CaCO3, specific conductivity 130 umhos/cm /93.81% pure chlorendic anhydride/
